QuestData.Title: Keeping the Balance
QuestData.Description: Look at these teeth, friend. These stress markings suggest that the crocolisk are being subjugated by one of their own. When a crocolisk female grows large enough, she exerts dominance over her kin.$B$BIt is my duty as a hunter to ensure balance is restored to these creatures as thanks for their sacrifice for my own life.$B$BTrack down the beast and slay her while I tend to my wounds. She is likely at the far end of the arbitum.
